markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bloodletting Kukri](/Equipment.aspx?ID=381)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 600 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 240 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Kukri](/Weapons.aspx?ID=56)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+1 striking [kukri](/Weapons.aspx?ID=56)_ has a crimson blade that shimmers eerily in bright light. On a critical hit, the kukri deals 1d8 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). If the target didn’t already have persistent bleed damage when you scored the critical hit, you also gain 1d8 temporary Hit Points.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Bloodletting Kukri
